segments.text: I'd like to buy one of these refrigerators . Do I have to pay in cash ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , we have an easy-payment plan . One-third down , and the balance in six months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine . Will you work out the details , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . Would you sit here please ? I'll call our credit manager .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's just a formality , but for hire purchase we usually require references .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of references do you need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps your employer could supply us with one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sure he could , but I prefer not to bother him . Would my bank do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . A simple letter from your bank would be quite satisfactory .
segments.speaker: S2
